content: materials - 1 skein koigu painter s palette 1 or another fingering weight yarn approximately 150 yards required - us 3 3 25 mm 16-inch circular needles 2 - a set of us 3 double-pointed needles 3 - a stitch marker 4 gauge 7 stitches = 1 inch in stockinette stitch note if you are unsure about your gauge or think you want a slightly floppier beret please make sure you have 2 skeins to work with size finished dimensions 20 inches in circumference comfortably stretching up to 2 inches 1 https //www purlsoho com/koigu-painter-s-palette-premium-merino-kpppm-and-premium-merino-kpm html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=888 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964
